title: Make It Forever
lyrics:
How long can I miss you
I want you to know
The seconds you leave me
Are ticking so slow
I give up

I know that I need it

When Iâ€™ve had enough

Like falling to pieces

And picking them up

Let me go



Holding back the tears

From falling

That's what I do



Holding back the tears so long



When you come back again

We can convene make it forever

We can convene make it forever
